fix: Resolve mobile horizontal scroll and remove UI borders in BookingDetailsModal

This commit implements a comprehensive fix for mobile responsiveness issues
and simplifies the UI by removing decorative borders and backgrounds.

## Mobile Horizontal Scroll Fix

### Root Cause
The horizontal scroll on mobile was caused by the calendar toolbar (423px)
exceeding the viewport width (375px) by 48px. While the modal itself was
correctly sized, the underlying page created scrollable overflow.

### Solution Implemented
1. **Enhanced Body Scroll Lock**
   - Lock scroll on both `document.body` AND `document.documentElement`
   - Set `body.position = ''fixed''` to completely prevent scroll
   - Set `body.width = ''100%''` to constrain body width to viewport
   - Proper cleanup restores all original styles when modal closes

2. **Modal Container Overflow Control**
   - Added `overflowX: ''hidden''` and `overflowY: ''hidden''` to modal container
   - Backdrop now uses `width: ''100vw''` and `height: ''100vh''`
   - All child containers have `overflow-x: hidden` for defense in depth

3. **Ultra-Responsive Mobile Layout**
   - Header padding: 8px on mobile (was 12px+)
   - Tab Navigation: Icon-only on mobile (<640px), full labels on desktop
   - Content Area: Padding reduced to 12px (was 24px)
   - Action Buttons: Ultra-compact spacing (gap: 1.5, padding: 8px)
   - All text sizes responsive (text-xs mobile â†’ text-base desktop)
   - All icon sizes responsive (h-4 w-4 mobile â†’ h-5 w-5 desktop)

4. **Text Wrapping & Overflow Prevention**
   - InfoRow component: `break-words` + `overflow-wrap-anywhere` + `min-w-0`
   - All grid containers: `min-w-0` to allow proper shrinking
   - Labels: `flex-shrink-0` to prevent compression
   - Values: Full wrapping support for long emails/text

## UI Simplification - Border Removal

Removed all decorative borders and backgrounds from tab content,
leaving only clean label:value pairs:

### DetailsTab.tsx
- Removed colored badge for "Tipo Prenotazione" in view mode
- Now displays as simple text with `font-medium` styling

### MenuTab.tsx
- Removed blue box around "Menu Predefinito" label
- Removed gray box from empty state ("Nessun menu selezionato")
- Clean italic text for empty states

### DietaryTab.tsx
- Removed gray boxes with borders from all sections
- Clean checkboxes in edit mode without container backgrounds
- Simple bulleted list in view mode

### CollapsibleSection.tsx
- Removed outer border and background (`border-2`, `rounded-lg`, `bg-white`)
- Removed header background (`bg-gray-50`)
- Reduced padding: `p-4` â†’ `py-2` (header), `p-4` â†’ `pt-3` (content)
- Subtle hover effect on header button only

## Testing

Added comprehensive E2E tests:
- `booking-details-mobile-overflow.spec.ts` - Mobile overflow verification (5 tests)
- `verify-no-horizontal-scroll.spec.ts` - Scroll lock verification (3 tests)
- `debug-mobile-overflow-diagnostics.spec.ts` - Diagnostic tooling

## Visual Impact

**Before:**
- Horizontal scroll required on mobile to see close button and "Elimina"
- Heavy UI with gray boxes and borders around all sections
- Cluttered appearance with redundant visual containers

**After:**
- NO horizontal scroll on any mobile device (320px - 414px tested)
- Clean, minimalist UI with focus on content
- All interactive elements visible without scrolling
- Modern, spacious layout matching contemporary design standards

## Files Modified

Components:
- BookingDetailsModal.tsx (111 additions, 51 deletions)
- DetailsTab.tsx (26 modifications)
- MenuTab.tsx (10 modifications)
- DietaryTab.tsx (6 modifications)
- CollapsibleSection.tsx (6 modifications)

Tests & Documentation:
- Added 3 new E2E test suites (711 lines total)
- Added MOBILE_OVERFLOW_DIAGNOSTICS_REPORT.md (317 lines)
